Comment: One of the coolest public radio stations is KRVS Lafayette/Lake Charles, LA.  They do all kinds of programming to help keep local culture thriving like Cajun and Zydeco shows, promotion of cultural events and programming in English and Cajun French.   That’s the kind of thing that will be lost here.  The big city stations will have enough donors to make it through.
Author: jackasspenguin
